info.title: Authbridge API
info.description: API for managing Identity Provider (IDP) actors integrated with SSO to the inTandem authorization bridge

tags.name: IDP Actor Mapping
tags.description: The IDP Actor API facilitates seamless CRUD operations for managing users in an IDP integrated with SSO to the inTandem authorization bridge.

Bearer.description: Provide a valid bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {directory_token}'

idp_user_reference_id.description: External reference ID of the IDP User, used to link the IDP User to an external system.

actor_type.description: Type of the actor in the inTandem platform. 'staff' refers to a staff member, while 'operator' refers to an operator in the Operators Portal.

actor_uid.description: Unique identifier of the actor in the inTandem platform. This is used to link the IDP actor to a specific staff member or operator.

idp_user_reference_id.description: External reference ID of the IDP User, used to link the IDP User to an external system.

actor_type.description: Type of the actor in the inTandem platform. 'staff' refers to a staff member, while 'operator' refers to an operator in the Operators Portal.

actor_uid.description: Unique identifier of the actor in the inTandem platform. This is used to link the IDP actor to a specific staff member or operator.

parameters.name: idp_user_reference_id
parameters.description: Filter by external reference ID of the IDP User

parameters.name: actor_type
parameters.description: Filter by actor type. 'staff' refers to a staff member, while 'operator' refers to an operator in the Operators Portal.

parameters.name: actor_uid
parameters.description: Filter by unique identifier of the actor in the inTandem platform

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page

get.description:
List all IDP Actor Mappings in the directory scope.

Available for **Directory Tokens only**

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input data or missing required fields

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or not a Directory Token

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Business logic validation failed (e.g., invalid actor_uid or actor_type combination)

post.description:
Create a new IDP Actor Mapping for SSO integration.

Available for **Directory Tokens only**

delete.description: Delete an IDP Actor Mapping by UID. Available for **Directory Tokens only**

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the IDP Actor Mapping

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or not a Directory Token

404.description: Not Found - IDP Actor Mapping with the specified UID does not exist
